feed.title: cpprefjp - C++日本語リファレンス

entry.title: MB_CUR_MAX -- :削除、:後にスペース追加
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md b/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
index fb5c43f0e..3872e41c3 100644
--- a/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
+++ b/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
@@ -28,7 +28,7 @@ int main() {
   
   //ロケールを日本(UTF-8)に変更
   if (std::setlocale(LC_CTYPE, "ja_JP.UTF-8") == nullptr) {
-    std::cout << "Failed to set locale to: ja_JP.UTF-8"  << std::endl;
+    std::cout << "Failed to set locale to ja_JP.UTF-8"  << std::endl;
   } else {
     std::cout << "Locale: ja_JP.UTF-8, MB_CUR_MAX: " << MB_CUR_MAX << std::endl;
   }
@@ -42,8 +42,8 @@ Locale: ja_JP.UTF-8, MB_CUR_MAX: 6
 ```
 
 ## 関連項目
-- [`MB_LEN_MAX`](/reference/climits/mb_len_max.md):全ロケールでのマルチバイト文字の最大バイト数
-- `setlocale`:ロケールを変更する
+- [`MB_LEN_MAX`](/reference/climits/mb_len_max.md): 全ロケールでのマルチバイト文字の最大バイト数
+- `setlocale`: ロケールを変更する
 
 ## 参照
 - [mb_cur_max(3) - Linux man page](https://linux.die.net/man/3/mb_cur_max)

entry.title: MB_CUR_MAX -- コード例変更後、出力例の反映し忘れを変更
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md b/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
index 53908c1c0..fb5c43f0e 100644
--- a/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
+++ b/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
@@ -37,7 +37,7 @@ int main() {
 
 ### 出力例
 ```
-Locale: standard(C), MB_CUR_MAX: 1
+Locale: standard, MB_CUR_MAX: 1
 Locale: ja_JP.UTF-8, MB_CUR_MAX: 6
 ```

entry.title: MB_CUR_MAX -- `namespace std`の削除、表記の変更
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md b/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
index 21450cdb3..53908c1c0 100644
--- a/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
+++ b/reference/cstdlib/mb_cur_max.md
@@ -3,9 +3,7 @@
 * macro[meta id-type]
 
 ```cpp
-namespace std {
-  #define MB_CUR_MAX /* implementation defined */
-}
+#define MB_CUR_MAX implementation-defined
 ```
 
 ## 概要
@@ -28,12 +26,12 @@ int main() {
   //C ロケール(標準ASCII)
   std::cout << "Locale: standard, MB_CUR_MAX: " << MB_CUR_MAX << std::endl;
   
+  //ロケールを日本(UTF-8)に変更
   if (std::setlocale(LC_CTYPE, "ja_JP.UTF-8") == nullptr) {
-      std::cout << "Failed to set locale to: ja_JP.UTF-8"  << std::endl;
+    std::cout << "Failed to set locale to: ja_JP.UTF-8"  << std::endl;
+  } else {
+    std::cout << "Locale: ja_JP.UTF-8, MB_CUR_MAX: " << MB_CUR_MAX << std::endl;
   }
-  std::setlocale(LC_CTYPE, "ja_JP.UTF-8");//ロケールを日本語UTF-8に変更
-  std::cout << "Locale: ja_JP.UTF-8, MB_CUR_MAX: " << MB_CUR_MAX << std::endl;
-  return 0;
 }
 ```

entry.title: stderr -- removed /* */ for implementation-defined (#1473)
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/cstdio/stderr.md b/reference/cstdio/stderr.md
index 1909dbab2..d6d0ddf74 100644
--- a/reference/cstdio/stderr.md
+++ b/reference/cstdio/stderr.md
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@
 * macro[meta id-type]
 
 ```cpp
-#define stderr /* implementation-defined */
+#define stderr implementation-defined
 ```
 
 ## 概要

entry.title: tmpnam -- fixed index in tmpnam.md
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/cstdio/tmpnam.md b/reference/cstdio/tmpnam.md
index 1d293b29c..d25320e34 100644
--- a/reference/cstdio/tmpnam.md
+++ b/reference/cstdio/tmpnam.md
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ namespace std {
 #include <iostream>
 
 int main() {
-    char filename[1000];
+    char filename[L_tmpnam];
     if (std::tmpnam(filename)) {
         std::cout << "Generated filename: " << filename << '\n';
         // ここで fopen(filename, "w") とかして使う（が、あまり推奨されない）
